# Shield regenerating
Shields: Regenerating at {rate}/s ({shield}/{max})|Shields: Regenerating at {rate}/s ({shield}/{max})|shield=19|max=60|rate=1.0
# Shield Online
Shields: Online|Shields: Online
# Shields failed
Shields: FAILED|Shields: FAILED



BEGIN Engines charging
Warp engines: Charging ({charge}%)|Warp engines: Charging ({charge}%)|charge=25
END
